review: I love the Amazon Fire TV. I love how easy it is to use and find shows quickly for my three year old grandson. We bought this product thinking it would be nice for Netflicks . I was very pleasantly surprised at how well the voice activation work!!!!! Such a plus when looking for a certain show. Our Amazon Prime is wonderful to use. We plan to buy at least one more if not two.
author: Sue G.

review: I purchased this product thinking I would be able to stream a lot better at the far side of my home.  It works no better that my Roku which was half the price.  The  Roku is a bit friendlier to use.  I can add new channels with no problems. I do like the remote on the fire. The voice command is great,  Not sure if any of the movies  are free as all my request came with a cost. My kids like watching the WWE Network and the Fire does not offer the WWE Network.  I'll keep it for a month to see if it will grow on me. I don't think it will.
author: el toro "SFC TORO"

review: Voice recognition really works every time. The picture is so much better, also. Great product and very affordable. Highly recommend.
author: Elizabeth C. Feldt

review: I had a basic Roku and decided to give this one a try. Overall the most impressive thing for me is the very high resolution - it is a danged good picture. It comes loaded with all of my Amazon stuff. It was extremely easy to hook up and maneuver around once it was going. I like the display screens. The Pandora is very cool. I loaded some of my photos and he slide show is impressive and fun. So, Gary Busey is odd but is right on the money, this is a great addition to my home video system.
author: Gary Flanders
